name: sss-wasm
description: wasm bindings for the sss secret sharing library
author: Bakaoh

scripts.build: webpack --env dev --config ./webpack.config.cjs && webpack --config ./webpack.config.cjs --env build && npm run test
scripts.build:wasm: emcc -O3 -s WASM=1 -s EXPORT_ES6=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORT_NAME="Wrapper" -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["cwrap"]' -I sss lib/wrapper.c sss/hazmat.c sss/tweetnacl.c sss/sss.c randombytes.c  -o lib/gen/wrapper.js
